name: Douglas Bullet
text:
If you have 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, this Character gains +2000 power.
On Play: If your Leader has a type including "Roger Pirates", add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.

effect.text: If your Leader has a type including "Roger Pirates", add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.
